can play. Press [icon Abtn] and aim [icon WiiRemote] at the screen.
When you see [icon P2Pointer], you're ready to play!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidance002:
Collect [icon StarBit] with [icon P2Pointer]! Aim [icon P2Pointer], then press [icon Bbtn]
to shoot [icon StarBit]. Try hitting enemies with a [icon StarBit]!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidance003:
[setfontcol orange]P2 [setfontcol none]can move [icon P2Luma]. [setfontcol black]Point at stuff with [icon P2Pointer], then
press [icon Abtn] to see what happens! Try pointing at
various things with [icon P2Pointer]...[setfontcol none]
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidance004:
[setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]Aim at enemies[setfontcol black] with [icon P2Pointer], then press [icon Abtn] to stop
them in their tracks! You can then [setfontcol red]shake [setfontcol black][icon WiiRemote]
to make [icon P2Luma] [setfontcol blue]spin [setfontcol black]and attack enemies![setfontcol none]
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidance005:
Point at a [icon Coin] with [icon P2Pointer], and then press [icon Abtn]!
...[icon P2Luma] will run and grab it. Release [icon Abtn] to
toss the [icon Coin] to [setfontcol blue]P1[setfontcol none]!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceIcon: Things you can do in Co-Star Mode
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceTitle001:
How do you play with [icon P2Pointer] two people?
Co-Star Mode!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceTitle002: You can grab [icon StarBit] Star Bits and shoot them!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceTitle003: You can move the [icon P2Luma] Co-Star Luma!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceTitle004: You can freeze [icon Goomba] enemies and defeat them!
Layout_P2Manual.2PGuidanceTitle005: You can even carry [icon Coin] coins!

Layout_PauseMenu.PauseMenu_ConfirmEndGame: Do you really want to quit?

Layout_PeachLetterMini.PeachLetterMini_Body:
Would you like to share some
cake while we watch the shooting
stars? Meet me at the castle!

Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_BlueStar: Point at [icon PullStar], then press and hold [icon Abtn].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_Frame1: Point at the screen with [icon WiiRemote].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_MarioLauncher: Aim with [icon Reticle], then press [icon Abtn].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_TicoFat: Aim at the Luma, then press [icon Bbtn].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_YoshiCapture: Aim at [icon Flower], then press [icon Bbtn].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_YoshiEat: Point at things to eat, then press [icon Bbtn].
Layout_PointerGuidance.PointerGuidance_YoshiShot: Point the arrow, then press [icon Bbtn].

Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterBee_Body:
Wow! Even we couldn't get to the
[icon PowerStar] in Honeybloom Galaxy!

Here is a reward for your bravery!
Please accept this [icon 1UpMushroom]!
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterCaretaker1_Body:
I've got some cosmic odd jobs I need
done. Slackers need not apply!

If you're ready to work, come to
[setfontcol red]★Boulder Bowl Galaxy★[setfontcol black]!
I'll make it worth your while![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterCaretaker2_Body:
I've got a few odds and ends I need
taken care of. If you don't mind a
little hard work, come find me!

I'm working over in
[setfontcol red][setfontcol red]★Space Storm Galaxy★[setfontcol red][setfontcol black]!
I'll make it worth your while![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterLuigi_Body:
[setfontcol black]Still looking for [icon PowerStar] Power Stars?

If you need any help from me, just
look for the "L" on Starship Mario.

I'll switch with you anytime, Bro![setfontcol none]
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterPeach_Body:
I am very far away right now. But I'm
OK! I know you will come save me!

P.S. I've attached something to this
letter. I hope it will be useful...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterPichan1_Body:
Race! Race! Racing at 
[setfontcol red]★Wild Glide Galaxy★[setfontcol none]!

Don't chicken out! Don't chicken out!

C'mon - don't wait! Don't wait!
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterPichan2_Body:
Race! Race! Showdown at 
[setfontcol red]★Fleet Glide Galaxy★[setfontcol none]!

Come on! Come on! It's on!
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRabbit_Body:
[setfontcol blue]Jump [setfontcol black]and [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]spin[setfontcol none]! [setfontcol blue]Jump [setfontcol black]and [setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]spin[setfontcol none]!

Wall-jumping and spinning in mid-air
will show you all sorts of secret
places! So says the wisdom of the
bunny tribe! Boiyoing!
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRosetta1_Body:
I hope this letter reaches you in
bright spirits, little one.

This should be of some help to you
on your journey back to me. May the
stars shine down on you...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRosetta2_Body:
We worry about you, but we know
you are safe with your new friend.

I hope the attached item is helpful.
May the stars shine down on you...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRosetta3_Body:
If you're ever feeling alone, just know
that your friends are behind you.

I hope the attached item is helpful.
May the stars shine down on you...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRosetta4_Body:
There are many kindhearted people
out there who are watching over you.

I hope the attached item is helpful.
May the stars shine down on you...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterRosetta5_Body:
Be strong, and know that wherever
you are right now, I believe we will
be reunited soon.

I hope the attached item is helpful.
May the stars shine down on you...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterScoreAttack1_Body:
Hey, it's The Chimp. There's a
new game over in
[setfontcol red]★Honeyhop Galaxy★[setfontcol none].

If you think you got what it takes, 
swing on by...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterScoreAttack2_Body:
Hey, it's The Chimp. There's a
new game over in
[setfontcol red]★Slimy Spring Galaxy★[setfontcol none].

If you think you got what it takes, 
swing on by...
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterScoreAttack3_Body:
Hey, remember me? I got a new game
over in [setfontcol red]★Fluffy Bluff Galaxy★[setfontcol none].

Come on by and we'll do the whole
introductions thing. I wanna see
what kind of game skills you got.
Layout_PostLetter.PostmanLetterWitch_Body:
I have watched your actions from
across the galaxy. Here is a bit of
the power created from the energy
of you and your special one...
Use it wisely.

Layout_PrologueText.PrologueText_Pro00:
Now, let me tell you a new story that
also begins with stardust...
Layout_PrologueText.PrologueText_Pro01:
Shimmering stardust falls on the
Mushroom Kingdom once a century.
That time had come again...

Layout_StarPieceBank.StarPieceBank_Explain:
Choose an amount of [icon StarBitRainbow] to [setfontcol blue]deposit[setfontcol none]
or [setfontcol blue]withdraw[setfontcol none], then choose [setfontcol red]OK[setfontcol none]!

Layout_SupportPlayGuidance.SupportPlayGuidance_Text:
Aim [setfontcol orange]P2[setfontcol black]'s[setfontcol orange] [setfontcol none][icon P2Pointer], then press [setfontcol red][icon Abtn][setfontcol none]! Freeze
enemies in place with [icon Abtn] [setfontcol black]and [setfontcol red]shake [icon WiiRemote]
to spin[setfontcol black]. Do your best to help out [setfontcol blue]P1[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]

Layout_SysPALInfo.SysPALInfo_PALInfo:
Super Mario Galaxy 2 can be displayed in
60Hz (480i) Mode. Your current setting is
50Hz (576i) Mode. If your TV - like most TV
models - supports 60Hz Mode, please select
this TV Type in the Wii System Settings for
a better display quality.

To change your TV Type setting to 60Hz Mode, 
please press the HOME Button and go to
the Wii Menu.

LongForCastleGalaxy.BattanKing000_Flow000:
It makes me so mad! We build your
houses, your castles, your-- [wait 15]Aaargh!
I'm tired of this speech![newpage]
Let's see you try and [setfontcol red]ground-pound
[setfontcol none]the [setfontcol red]Whomp King[setfontcol none] again! Aaargh!
LongForCastleGalaxy.BattanKing000_Flow001:
It makes me so mad![newpage]
We build your houses, your castles.[wait 15]
We pave your roads, and still you
walk all over us.[newpage]
Do you ever say thank you? [wait 15]No![wait 15]
Well, you're not going to wipe your
feet on me! [newpage]
I think I'll crush you just for fun![wait 15] Do
you have a problem with that? [newpage]
Just try to [setfontcol red]ground-pound[setfontcol none] the
[setfontcol red]Whomp King[setfontcol none]! Ha!
LongForCastleGalaxy.BattanKing001_Flow000:
No! Crushed again![newpage]
I'm just a stepping stone, after all. I
won't gravel, er, grovel. [wait 15]OK, you win.
Here - take this with you!
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed000_Flow001:
Hey, you! Guy with the 'stache!
You came along just in time![newpage]
Would you do me a favour and get
that [icon PowerStar] back from the [setfontcol red]Whomp King
[setfontcol none]at the top of this hill?
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed001_Flow001:
You look sorta familiar, 'stache man!
How are you doing?[newpage]
A really pretty [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] [setfontcol none]landed here
recently, but the [setfontcol red]big bully at the
top of this hill [setfontcol none]took it!
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed002_Flow001:
There's a really [setfontcol red]scary guy [setfontcol none]at the top
of this hill. But I know I can count on
you and your fantastic 'stache![newpage]
Please take back that [icon PowerStar]!
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed010_Flow001:
Hey, 'stache man![wait 15] Thanks to you,
this place is peaceful again![newpage]
I've scattered some [setfontcol red][icon SilverStar] [setfontcol black]around here
for you! Go ahead and grab 'em![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed011_Flow001:
There was a [icon SilverStar] over there on top of
that cloud. [wait 15]What...?! Don't look at me
like that![wait 15] I didn't put it there...
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed011_Flow003: There's a [icon SilverStar] [setfontcol blue]up ahead[setfontcol none].
LongForCastleGalaxy.BombHeiRed012_Flow001:
Looking for a [setfontcol red][icon SilverStar] Silver Star[setfontcol black]? [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]I think
I saw one at the top of the hill.

LuigiTalkNpc.LuigiIntrusively000_Flow000:
Hey, Bro! You're looking for a [icon PowerStar]
around here, huh? You want me to
take over for a little while?
LuigiTalkNpc.LuigiIntrusively000_Flow002:
Well, I'll be right here if you ever
want me to [setfontcol red]jump in[setfontcol none]!
LuigiTalkNpc.LuigiIntrusively000_Flow003: You [setfontcol black]want to [setfontcol red]switch[setfontcol black], Bro[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
LuigiTalkNpc.LuigiIntrusively000_Flow004:
OK, Bro. I'll be right here!
Good luck out there!
LuigiTalkNpc.LuigiIntrusivelyStart_Flow000:
Hey, Bro! Everyone left me behind! I
had to hustle to get up here![newpage]
So, hey, guess what! I decided to
look for [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none] too![newpage]
If you see me out there, [setfontcol red]come say hi[setfontcol none]!
I can help you [setfontcol blue]save the universe[setfontcol none]!

MagicGalaxy.Kinopio000_Flow001:
I'm searching for the [setfontcol red]captain[setfontcol none], but
there are enemies everywhere!

MagicRelayPlanetZone.Kinopio000_Flow001:
A captain should never be scared...[wait 15]
even when surrounded by enemies![wait 30] I'm
just taking a break right now, heh...

ManekuriAZone.SignBoard001_Flow000:
Watch out for [setfontcol red]Cosmic Clones [setfontcol none]ahead!
If they come after you, RUN!

MarioFaceShipZone.BombHeiRed000:
Have you heard of this [setfontcol red]mythical[setfontcol black],
[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][setfontcol red]legendary world[setfontcol none]?[newpage]
It sounds like an amazing place, but I
wonder how you get there...
MarioFaceShipZone.CareTakerHunter000_Flow000:
Hiya! Thanks again for all your
help. Take this [icon 1UpMushroom]!
MarioFaceShipZone.CareTakerHunter000_Flow001: I kinda dig those [icon Goomba] [setfontcol red]guys[setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.CareTakerHunter001_Flow000:
Hiya! Thanks again for all your
help. Take this [icon 1UpMushroom]!
MarioFaceShipZone.CareTakerHunter001_Flow001:
I just love the way those li'l [icon Topman] [setfontcol red]red
guys[setfontcol none] spin!
MarioFaceShipZone.HoneyBee000:
Bet you'd like to know [setfontcol blue]our secret[setfontcol black]...[setfontcol blue][setfontcol none][newpage]
When we get [icon Coin] [setfontcol yellow]coins [setfontcol none]in the air,
we can [setfontcol blue]fly farther[setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow000:
Hi, [setfontcol black][Mario/Luigi]! We are the [setfontcol red]Toad Brigade[setfontcol black]!
Our [setfontcol black]goal is to find [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars
[setfontcol black]and save [setfontcol red]Princess Peach[setfontcol black]![setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol black]Worry not, because we've got it all
under control. [setfontcol black]This mission is child's
play for the [setfontcol red]Toad Brigade[setfontcol black]![setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow001:
We have access to a new world! Now
we can boldly explore new places.[newpage]
[setfontsize normal]Everyone shall see the glory of the
[setfontcol red]Toad Brigade [setfontcol black]as we streak across
the cosmos[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow002:
I just discovered an [setfontcol red]enormous comet[setfontcol none]!
I'm gonna be so famous! It's the find
of the century![newpage]
Can I just name it "Toad Captain's
Comet"?[setfontsize small] Hehehe!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow003:
Well, now there's a [setfontcol red]lot more places we
can go[setfontcol none]! Looks like the Toad Brigade
will be busy for quite a while!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow005:
None of this would've happened if the
[setfontcol blue]Toad Brigade[setfontcol none] had been allowed to
look after [setfontcol red]Princess Peach[setfontcol none]! No way!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow007:
How is [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol none]doing? I was thinking
it might be fun to go on an adventure
with [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow009:
[Mario/Luigi]! We are approaching enemy
territory! I'm so...[setfontsize small]scared... [setfontsize normal]I mean 
EXCITED! I'm excited! Let's go!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow011:
I heard about a [setfontcol black][setfontcol blue]legendary world
[setfontcol black]where the treasure is very--
Uh, never mind! I don't know anything![setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio001_Flow012:
It's a miracle in space! A[wait 5] MIR[wait 5]A[wait 5]CLE[wait 5]!
That was awesome!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow000:
It looks like a Luma named [setfontcol red]Lubba [setfontcol none]is
in charge here.[newpage]
Despite being a bit curt, this Luma
seems to be well regarded by
the crew!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow001:
If you get a [icon GrandStar] [setfontcol red]Grand Star[setfontcol black], [setfontcol red][setfontcol none]you
can use its power to open up a [setfontcol blue]portal
through space and time[setfontcol none]![newpage]
You can use these portals to travel
to new worlds and search for even
more [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power Stars[setfontcol none]![newpage]
Keep that up, and I bet you'll be
able to figure out where [setfontcol blue]Bowser[setfontcol none] is!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow002:
When a [setfontcol red]Prankster Comet [setfontcol none]comes along,
you may see some [setfontcol blue]strange [setfontcol none][setfontcol blue]changes[setfontcol none].
Even in places you've already been!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow003:
This place sure is lively now![newpage]
I'm learning so much just from talking
to [setfontcol red]everyone here[setfontcol none].
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow004:
I've been hearing rumours about a
[setfontcol black][setfontcol red]mysterious spirit[setfontcol black] [setfontcol none][setfontcol black]somewhere
out there in the universe...[setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow005: I hope it's a [setfontcol red]helpful spirit[setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow006:
You can't just plough straight on
through, you know![newpage]
Go back and visit some galaxies,
take a break every once in a while,
and think out your strategy!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow007:
[setfontcol red]Bowser [setfontcol none]wants to collect [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol yellow]Power
Stars [setfontcol none]to make himself [setfontcol blue]king of the
universe[setfontcol none]![newpage]
We can't let that happen! Bowser
would make the worst king of the
universe EVER!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow009:
I've been hearing this rumour that
[setfontcol red]a ghost[setfontcol none] [setfontcol red]Luigi keeps showing up [setfontcol none]in
some galaxies!
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio002_Flow011:
Those [icon GreenComet] [setfontcol green]Green Stars [setfontcol none]are scattered
all over the cosmos![newpage]
Just make sure you [setfontcol blue]move your
camera around [setfontcol none]and look at everything
from a different angle...[newpage]
But you're a pro, [Mario/Luigi]! I'm sure
you'll find them all, no problem.
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio003_Flow000:
[setfontcol black]The [icon Luma] [setfontcol yellow]Lumas [setfontcol black]made us a ship that
[setfontcol blue]looks just like a mushroom[setfontcol black]![newpage]
How amazing is that?! Plus, it actually
worked and got us here safely![setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio004_Flow011:
Hey - everyone's waiting for you on
the [setfontcol red]Starshroom[setfontcol none]! We found a [icon 1UpMushroom],
so we're keeping it there for you.
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio005_Flow000:
That spaceship is supposed to [setfontcol red]look
like Mario[setfontcol none], but if you ask me, it looks
more like [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol none].[newpage]
[setfontcol black]I wonder how [setfontcol green]Luigi [setfontcol black]is doing... He's still
back in the [setfontcol red]Mushroom Kingdom[setfontcol black], right[setfontcol red][setfontcol black][setfontcol black]?[setfontcol black][setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.Kinopio005_Flow001:
You can never have too many
[icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushrooms[setfontcol none]!

[setfontcol black]There was a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green][var integer 1 0]-Up[setfontcol black] [setfontcol green]Mushroom[setfontcol black]

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterNormal_Flow002:
Come see me next time there's a

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterNormal_Flow003:
Huh-whaaa? Looks like you've got

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterPeach_Flow000:
[Mario/Luigi]! You got a letter from
[setfontcol red]Princess Peach[setfontcol none]!
MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterPeach_Flow001:
[setfontcol black]Princess Peach included [setfontcol red]five[setfontcol black] [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up
Mushrooms [setfontcol black]in her [setfontcol red]letter[setfontcol black]![newpage]
Aw... Even when she's kidnapped, the
princess is so thoughtful![newpage]
Well, come see me next time there's
a mail delivery.[setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterPeach_Flow002:
[setfontcol black]There were [setfontcol red]five[setfontcol black] [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushrooms[setfontcol black]
attached to the [setfontcol red]letter[setfontcol black]![newpage]
Huh? It's addressed to [icon MarioFace] [setfontcol red]Mario[setfontcol black]...
But, don't worry, [icon LuigiFace] [setfontcol green]Luigi[setfontcol black]! I'm sure it

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterRosetta_Flow000:
A [icon Letter] [setfontcol red]letter [setfontcol none]addressed to the [icon YoungMasterLuma] [setfontcol blue]baby
Luma[setfontcol none] has arrived.
MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterRosetta_Flow001:
Wow! T[setfontcol black]here were [setfontcol blue]50 [setfontcol black][setfontcol black][setfontcol black][icon StarBit][setfontcol black] [setfontcol black]attached to

[Mario/Luigi]! There's a [setfontcol red]mysterious letter

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanLetterWitch_Flow001:
[setfontcol black]There were [setfontcol red][var integer 1 0][setfontcol black] [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up Mushrooms[setfontcol black]

So this [setfontcol blue]person you share a special
bond with[setfontcol black]... Could it be [setfontcol red]someone from

MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanNoNewLetter_Flow000:
Hello! I've held on to every [setfontcol red][icon Letter] [setfontcol black]I've
received! Here - look...[setfontcol red][setfontcol none]

Come see me next time there's a
mail delivery!
MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanOpen_Flow000:
Hey, [Mario/Luigi]! I decided to start
[setfontcol red]delivering mail[setfontcol none]![newpage]
And my first [setfontcol red][icon Letter] letter [setfontcol black]is[setfontcol red] [setfontcol black]for you![setfontcol red][setfontcol none]
MarioFaceShipZone.KinopioPostmanOpen_Flow002:
[setfontcol black]Princess Peach included a [icon 1UpMushroom] [setfontcol green]1-Up

Aw... Even when she's kidnapped, the

Well, come see me next time there's

MarioFaceShipZone.LuigiTalkNpc000_Flow000:
I want to look for [setfontcol yellow][icon PowerStar] Power Stars
[setfontcol black]too![setfontcol yellow][setfontcol none][setfontcol black][newpage]
[setfontcol none]If you see me out there in one of the
galaxies, [setfontcol red]say hello[setfontcol none]! If anyone [setfontcol blue]saves
the universe[setfontcol none], it's gonna be me!
MarioFaceShipZone.LuigiTalkNpc001:
Hey, Bro! I'm all over the place these
days, exploring the universe![newpage]
Next time you see me out there,
talk to me and let [setfontcol green]me [setfontcol none]leap into action,
OK? Catch you later, Bro!
MarioFaceShipZone.Meister002_Flow000:
So you're this [setfontcol red][Mario/Luigi] [setfontcol black]guy my little
[setfontcol yellow][icon Luma] [setfontcol black][setfontcol yellow]Lumas[setfontcol black] won't stop blabbing
about, am I right?[setfontcol red][setfontcol none][newpage]
Sorry to hear about the excitement
you had with that [icon Bowser] [setfontcol blue]monster[setfontcol none] down
in the Mushroom Kingdom.[newpage]
I sure appreciate you bringing us
this [icon PowerStar] [setfontcol red]Power Star[setfontcol none], though! We need

(林田による解説)星くず祭のパラレル
ワールドです。[newpage]
違いを見せるため昼間のイメージ。[newpage]
舞台はグランドフィナーレギャラクシーの
パラレルギャラクシーで、[newpage]
キノピオ探検隊の凱旋後です。[newpage]
ギャラクシー1をやった人には、
あえて見覚えのある所を使うことで、[newpage]
コンセプトのパラレルワールド
というものを匂わせることと、[newpage]
ギャラクシー1とのつながりを示唆しま
す(NPCや変身も使いまわすため)
PeachCastleFinalStartZone.SignBoard001:
(林田による解説)[newpage]
カメラはギャラクシー1のときは
フォローカメラで奥に進む構成でしたが[newpage]
並行カメラで右に進む構成をとり、
少し違う感じを出します。[newpage]
また、操作もしやすくなります。
コースは城下町で終わり、[newpage]
ピーチ城まではいけませんし、
見えません。
PeachCastleFinalStartZone.SignBoard002:
(林田による解説)[newpage]
世界が切り替わったところは、
クッパに制圧されたピーチ城下町です[newpage]
ギャラクシー1で襲撃をされる
シーンがありますが、[newpage]
より破壊された状態です
地割れによる奈落死亡があります
PeachCastleFinalStartZone.SignBoard003:
(林田による解説)
このステージを、[newpage]
元倉さんのページにある動かす絵本風
に仕上げることも考えています
PeachCastleFinalStartZone.SignBoard004:
(林田による解説)[newpage]
舞台はギャラクシー1とは時系列で
つながっておらず、別世界です。[newpage]
出てくるキャラクターはギャラクシー1
での出来事は知りません。[newpage]
しかし、ロゼッタはそのあたりも、
知っている風です。[newpage]
このあたりのことは、
具体的に説明せず[newpage]
ユーザーの想像を
ふくらませるようにします
